data: “Why are you going to the United States?” asked an American, no longer in his first youth, of a young Englishwoman, on board the Teutonic, the second day after they had left Liverpool.
second day after they had left Liverpool
"Why are you going to the United States?" asked an American, no longer in his first youth, of a young Englishwoman, on board the _Teutonic_, the second day after they had left Liverpool.
